amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the bill will not affect native American languages or the Individuals with Disabilities Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that the provisions of the bill shall not affect native American languages, or have any impact on testing associated with the Individuals with Disabilities Act. The amendment would exempt art terms and foreign phrases from the provisions of the bill.

action.text: Cunningham amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Amends the short title, designating the bill as the "Bill Emerson English as the Official Language Act."

Cunningham amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Modification to include Native Alaskan languages, along with Native American languages, which are to be exempt from the provisions of the bill.
On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
